cause.description:
We provide successful mentoring relationships for all children who need and want them, contributing to brighter futures, better schools, and stronger communities. Visit www.bigbrothersbigsister.org to find out how one hour a week can make a BIG impact on your life and the life of a child!
1. Big Brothers Big Sisters is the nation’s oldest, largest, and most effective mentoring agency
2. Each of us had a special person who opened doors and widened our horizons. You can do the same for a child.
3. While it’s as simple as playing board games or watching movies, these relationships can change how children grow up in Oklahoma
cause.mission: help children reach their potential through professionally supported, one-to-one relationships with measurable impact.
cause.name: Big Brothers Big Sisters of Oklahoma
